title: Delete Lethality
body: Lethality is possibly the most broken statthat League of legends has introduced to the rift since the ability to report someone for being unskilled. PLEASE remove or nerf it to the ground like you did to kindred

replies.body:
Lethality got nerfed, probably getting nerfed again (check PBE).

Lol.. people actually remember "unskilled". 
Every time some kid says "we need option 2 repert 4 badddd"... "remember when that was an option? Of course not."
